titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: These papers appear to come from Dr. William V. Longbrake (born in 1909) who was clerk of the Permanent Judicial Commission in 1978.

scopecontent.p: This collection contains reports and related records, 1967-1969. Included are minutes of the Council of Denominational Executives; reports, agendas, questionnaires, and program proposals from a variety of other urban, civic, and ecumenical organizations including: the Council for Community Responsibility, the Center for Civic Initiative, the Ecumenical Urban Cadre, Greater Milwaukee Conference on Urban Affairs, and the Wisconsin Council of Churches. The group was working towards an interdenominational strategy for addressing problems and challenges of urban life. Includes discussions of training of church members (clergy and laity) to work for justice in metropolitan Milwaukee.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.

acqinfo.p: Provenance: Synod of Lakes and Prairies
